name: NECRODECORATOR (jomarcella, hankworx, Grayson Spencer, Dave Pickett)
name_original: NECRODECORATOR (jomarcella, hankworx, Grayson Spencer, Dave Pickett)
description:
Construct your Halloween decorations, and place them on your front lawn! I'm sure they're safe!

---------------------------------------

Click on the unfinished decorations to work on them. Drag and drop the items into place.
